actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Labor Department, OMB.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Labor to identify and address the unique needs of immigrants in the United States taking into account that immigrants are concentrated in a select number of identifiable cities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Labor Gateway City Act of 1983 - Directs the Secretary of Labor to: (1) conduct a study, in consultation with the Commissioner of Immigration and Naturalization and concerned city officials and individuals, to assess Department of Labor efforts in response to the unique employment needs in areas of high immigrant concentration; and (2) report to the Congress within one year.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Labor to identify and address the unique needs of immigrants in the United States taking into account that immigrants are concentrated in a select number of identifiable cities, and for other purposes.
